room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game New York in New York
review: We had so much fun at The Escape Game as a team building experience! I would highly recommend for any teams. Best way to bond and get rid of stress!

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game New York in New York
review: Not only was it a LOT of fun, it was awesome team building with my co-workers and the staff could not have made the experience more enjoyable for us. Would HIGHLY recommend this to anyone who wants a solid hour of action, puzzles and real immersive problem solving.

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game New York in New York
review: This is the 2nd time I participate in an Ecape the Room game as a Holiday outing with my employees. Very immersive, lots of fun and for sure a team building experience, as we all have to work together to escape the room! Multi room experience makes it even more interesting, fun and adventurous! Staff was great too!

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game New York in New York
review: A great team building activity for my friends and I. The staff was lovely and the game was just challenging enough. So much fun!
